name: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
desc: The identifiers that create characteristic type objects.

items.name: static let activityMoveMode: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A characteristic identifier for the user’s activity mode.

items.name: static let biologicalSex: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A characteristic type identifier for the user’s sex.

items.name: static let bloodType: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A characteristic type identifier for the user’s blood type.

items.name: static let dateOfBirth: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A characteristic type identifier for the user’s date of birth.

items.name: static let fitzpatrickSkinType: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A characteristic type identifier for the user’s skin type.

items.name: static let wheelchairUse: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A characteristic identifier for the user’s use of a wheelchair.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized characteristic type identifier using the provided string.
